vgu.consumer

Class ConsumerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • vgu.consumer.ConsumerFactory

  • public class ConsumerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This Factory should return one or several of the self-implemented. Consumers, derived from 'interfaces.AbstractComponent'. It is a convenient place implement distribution and frequency of consumer types.

      • generate

        public static AbstractComponent generate(java.lang.String name,
                                         double maxPower,
                                         double minPower,
                                         double maxChange,
                                         double minChange)
        Generate a single consumer.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the consumer
        maxPower - maximum possible consuming power
        minPower - minimum possible consuming power
        maxChange - maximum possible change of power
        minChange - minimum possible change of power
        Returns:
        a new consumer object based on the parameters

      • generate

        public static java.util.ArrayList<AbstractComponent> generate(int amount,
                                                              int avgPower,
                                                              int std)
        Generate a set of consumers.
        Parameters:
        amount - Number of consumers to generate
        avgPower - Mean Power of the determined amount of consumers
        std - Standard Deviation of power
        Returns:
        an ArrayList that contains a range of designated amount of consumers
